publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2168 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Committee of the Whole Parliamentâ€”That the Parliament agrees that in accordance with Rule 9.7.1 (b) of the Standing Orders, Stage 2 of the Erskine Bridge Tolls Bill be taken by a Committee of the Whole Parliament and directs that any division shall be conducted using the electronic voting system. Supported by: Euan Robson*
